TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectoryCatalog extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.INotifyComposablePartCatalogChanged, class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement
Public Class DirectoryCatalog Inherits ComposablePartCatalog Implements ICompositionElement, INotifyComposablePartCatalogChanged
type DirectoryCatalog = class inherit ComposablePartCatalog interface INotifyComposablePartCatalogChanged interface ICompositionElement

summary.span: 在指定目錄的組件中探索屬性化組件。

span.span: Discovers attributed parts in the assemblies in a specified directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用剖析指定的目錄的內容物件。You can use a object to parse the contents of a designated directory. 動態連結程式庫 (DLL) 檔案中包含任何屬性化組件擷取並可透過目錄。若要限制特定 dll 剖析，您可以指定搜尋模式，使用相同的語法為方法。Any attributed parts contained in dynamic link library (DLL) files are extracted and made available through the catalog.To restrict parsing to specific DLLs, you can specify a search pattern by using the same syntax as the method. > [!WARNING] > 指定的目錄不應該允許非系統管理員存取。The designated directory should not allow access to non-administrators. 比方說，如果使用包含網際網路暫存檔的資料夾，可能可以建立弱點在您的應用程式。For example, using a folder that contains temporary Internet files could create vulnerabilities in your application. 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立從執行的組件的應用程式在目錄中搜尋的物件。The following example creates a object that searches the directory the application runs from for parts. 它會使用簡單的匯入測試目錄。It uses a simple import to test the catalog. 為了滿足此匯入，在目錄中的 DLL 必須相符的匯出，第二個程式碼區塊中所示。To fulfill this import, a DLL in the directory must have a matching export, as illustrated in the second code block. [!code-csharp[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/cs/consoleapplication7/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/vb/consoleapplication8/module1.vb#1)] 若要建立相符的匯出，下列程式碼必須在 DLL 檔案。To create the matching export, the following code must be in a DLL file. 若要在 Visual Studio 中建立的 DLL 檔案，將類型 「 類別庫 」 的新專案加入方案，並將此程式碼置於。To create a DLL file in Visual Studio, add a new project of the type "Class Library" to your solution, and place this code in it. [!code-csharp[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/cs/classlibrary1/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Composition.DirectoryCatalog#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.directorycatalog/vb/classlibrary1/class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 以目錄中符合搜尋模式的最新檔案重新整理 。

span.span: Refreshes the objects with the latest files in the directory that match the search pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果檔案已經新增至目錄中，它們也會新增至目錄。If files were added to the directory, they are also added to the catalog. 如果檔案已移除目錄中，它們也會移除從類別目錄。If files were removed from the directory, they are also removed from the catalog. 已移除的檔案，無法將組件從程序，因此卸載物件將會移除這些檔案，只是從類別目錄。For files that have been removed, the assembly cannot be unloaded from the process, so objects for those files will be removed only from the catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SearchPattern As String
public: property System::String ^ SearchPattern { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳遞至 物件之建構函式的搜尋模式。

span.span: Gets the search pattern that is passed into the constructor of the object.

value.span: 目錄用來尋找檔案的搜尋模式。

span.span: The search pattern the catalog uses to find files.

value.span: 預設為 \*.dll，這會傳回所有 DLL 檔案。

span.span: The default is \*.dll, which returns all DLL files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
